content.question: Which of the following developments can be most directly attributed to Portuguese and Spanish state sponsorship of maritime exploration in the late fifteenth century?

choices.label: Improvements in European geographic knowledge of Africa and the Indian Ocean
Improvements in Europeansâ€™ ability to prevent the spread of infectious diseases
Religious divisions in Europe related to the Protestant Reformation
The development of theories of natural rights and representative government

content.answer: Improvements in European geographic knowledge of Africa and the Indian Ocean

topic.text: 4.2: Exploration - Causes and Events from 1450 to 1750

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
